name: Be a Sphere
description:
KeyBoard - Move - W,A,S,D 

                           Shoot -Left Mouse Click

                           Evasion - Right Mouse Click

GamePad - Move - Left Stick

                       - Aim - Right Stick

                         Shoot - R2 Trigger

                         Evasion - L2 Trigger

if u playing GamePad, u can select skill card only mouse Sorry ;-)

or read dialog too.

thank you.
